name: Skull-A-Mania
description:
This game was made in 48 cumulative hours, as part of Miziziziz's #Mizjam. 

The game is a sort-of top-down shooter, except you don't shoot. You bounce around as Pancake, the demon skull, eating adventurers who have dared try and conquer your underground dungeon-y lair. You do all this while listening to a funky (public doman) soundtrack while the disco aesthetic slowly rises along with your progress.

Controls are hopefully explained in an intuitive way, but if not:

Arrow keys to move, hold Shift to nom things.

I also created a video devlog for this, which you can see here:
